name: Waste Not, Want Not
description:
This is a 2D Platform shooter where the Guns only have one bullet and only one use

 

  • WD to Move Left and Right
  • Scroll wheel to change weapons
  • Mouse to aim and left click to shoot
  • Space to Jump

  

  • shooting
  • waste of guns
  • platforming
  • simple color block art

 

Solo Project made by Connor Swannell

Thank you to 

Jamie for the support while making the game.
